missionDescription: Update the intake checklist to require exact claim text (verbatim) + context (speaker/date/link) + provenance anchor, and add validation rules/abstention criteria when any required field is missing.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Identifies the primary blocker that caused pilot work to stall (missing verbatim claim text), enabling a hard gate in the intake checklist so agents cannot begin without required fields....
